task_name: Setup Automated Onboarding Workflow for New Hires
context: using n8n with Google Drive, Gmail, and task tracking integration
description: Automate new hire onboarding process from contract signing to Day 1: send welcome emails, create employee folders, provision IT accounts, assign tasks, track completion. Reduces onboarding admin from hours to minutes. Part of Week 4 implementation focusing on operational automation.
dependencies: Google Drive folder structure template created
Contract signing system (Zoho Sign, DocuSign, or manual trigger)
tools_required: Notion or task manager (for onboarding checklist)
success_criteria: Workflow triggers automatically when contract is signed
Welcome email sent with personalized content
Employee folder created in Google Drive with all templates
HR manager notified of new hire onboarding initiated
Test run successful with dummy employee data

steps.name: Create Google Drive folder template structure for new employees
inputs: Folder structure design: Employee_Name > [Personal_Documents, Contracts, Payroll, Performance_Reviews, Training_Materials]
Template files to include: Employee handbook, Policies, Welcome guide, First week checklist
outputs: Master template folder created: 'NEW_HIRE_TEMPLATE'
Folder structure with 5 subfolders
Template documents uploaded
Sharing permissions configured (employee view-only, HR edit access)
steps.success_criteria: Template folder complete, ready to be copied for each new hire

steps.name: Create onboarding checklist template
inputs: Onboarding phases: Preboarding (Day -7 to Day 0), Day 1, Week 1, Week 2-4, Day 30, Day 90
Tasks for each phase (from HR videos research.md)
outputs: Onboarding checklist template with 40+ tasks:
Preboarding: Welcome email, IT setup, documentation tasks, first day schedule
Day 1: Account provisioning, orientation meetings, team introductions, workspace setup
Week 1-4: Training modules, buddy check-ins, feedback surveys, role-specific training
Day 30/90: Extended feedback, performance check-in, onboarding completion review
Each task with: Description, Owner (HR/IT/Manager/Employee), Due date offset (e.g., Day -7, Day 1), Status, Priority
steps.success_criteria: Comprehensive checklist covering full onboarding journey, clear ownership

steps.name: Build n8n workflow trigger: Contract signed event
inputs: Trigger options: Zoho Sign webhook OR DocuSign webhook OR Notion database change (Status='Hired') OR Manual trigger
New hire data: Full name, Email, Start date, Position, Department, Manager name, Manager email
outputs: n8n trigger configured (webhook or database polling)
New hire data variables captured
Workflow activation ready
steps.success_criteria: Trigger fires reliably when contract signed or status changed to 'Hired'

steps.name: Build workflow step: Create employee folder in Google Drive
inputs: Template folder ID from Step 1
New hire name from trigger
Target parent folder: 'Employees' in Google Drive
outputs: n8n nodes: Get Template Folder â†’ Copy Folder â†’ Rename to Employee Name â†’ Set Permissions (employee + HR) â†’ Get Folder Link
Employee folder created with structure: 'John_Doe > [Personal_Documents, Contracts, Payroll, Performance_Reviews, Training_Materials]'
Sharing permissions: Employee (view), HR (edit), Manager (view)
steps.success_criteria: Folder created automatically, correctly named, templates copied, permissions set

steps.name: Build workflow step: Send welcome email to new hire
inputs: New hire email, name, start date, position, manager name

outputs: Professional HTML email template:

Attachments: Employee handbook, First day agenda
Tone: Warm, welcoming, informative
steps.success_criteria: Welcome email is professional, personalized, contains all essential info

steps.name: Build workflow step: Generate onboarding checklist and assign tasks
inputs: Onboarding checklist template from Step 2
New hire data (name, start date, manager)
Task ownership assignments
outputs: n8n workflow: Copy checklist template â†’ Personalize with employee name and dates â†’ Assign tasks to owners (HR, IT, Manager, Employee) â†’ Share with all stakeholders
Dynamic due dates calculated (e.g., Start Date - 7 days for preboarding tasks)

steps.success_criteria: Personalized checklist created, tasks assigned with correct due dates, stakeholders notified

steps.name: Build workflow step: Submit IT setup request automatically
inputs: IT request format: Employee name, Position, Department, Start date, Equipment needed (laptop, phone, etc.), Software access needed (email, CRM, project management, etc.)
IT team email or ticketing system API
outputs: Automated IT request email sent to IT team:
Subject: 'New Hire IT Setup - {{Employee_Name}} - Start Date: {{Start_Date}}'
Body: Structured request with all required info
Priority: Normal (or High if start date within 5 days)
CC: HR manager, Hiring manager
steps.success_criteria: IT team receives structured request automatically, has time to prepare before Day 1

Summary of automated actions completed

steps.success_criteria: Stakeholders informed, have visibility into onboarding progress, know their responsibilities

steps.success_criteria: Reminders sent automatically at correct times, reduce no-shows and Day 1 confusion

compliance_notes: GDPR: New hire personal data (email, name) processed with consent via contract. Store employee folders with appropriate access controls (HR only until Day 1, then employee access granted). Data retention: Employee folders archived but not deleted after employment ends (legal requirement for payroll/contract records). Audit log maintained in n8n execution history.

troubleshooting.issue: Google Drive folder creation fails due to permissions
troubleshooting.solution: Verify n8n service account has edit access to parent 'Employees' folder, re-authenticate Google Drive OAuth

troubleshooting.issue: Welcome email not received by new hire
troubleshooting.solution: Check email address is correct in trigger data, verify Gmail OAuth connection active, check spam folder
Verify start date format (YYYY-MM-DD), check n8n date calculation logic, test with different start dates

troubleshooting.issue: Workflow triggers multiple times for same new hire
troubleshooting.solution: Add deduplication logic: check if employee folder already exists before creating, use unique employee ID

troubleshooting.issue: Preboarding reminders not sent at correct time
troubleshooting.solution: Verify scheduled workflow is active, check timezone settings in n8n, test with near-future dates
